question: ISRO recently lost its contact with the __________ , India's most powerful communication satellite, in less than 48 hours after it was launched.
explanation: ISRO has lost contact with the GSAT-6A, India's most powerful communication satellite, in less than 48 hours after it was launched. The GSAT-6A, the 2nd in the series of GSAT-6 satellites to provide high-speed broadband on mobile phones was designed for a life of 10 years. This is the second mission failure for Isro in six months, with the previous one being the PSLV-C39.
